name: Moon Fun Base
description:
Moon Fun Base is the first prototype of Studio Canap'. Build your moonbase, be careful to have enough oxygen and energy... And make it a fun place to be ! Reach the max fun level to win the game.
Disclaimer : this is a prototype, not a full game. Only 5 minutes of minimal gameplay are available at the moment.

Sound : Silverdell
Graph : Katrielle D
Prog : Blue
